Author: tyohn
Content: Do you mean Flash animation or ActionScript?  I learned Flash/ActionScript and PHP at the same time by reading Foundation PHP 5 for Flash.  But I already had an understanding of animation programs like Toon Boon and Autodesk Animator Pro.

Author: inklesspen
Content: Luckily I don't use a massive, magical code base like Django or TurboGears. I use Pylons, which is small enough that you can understand it all, large enough that you can actually do useful things with it, and written by some very smart people.

Author: davidw
Content: You could pay for a day/afternoon.  The people out to rip you off will be looking for long term contracts, to milk you, whereas someone on the level ought to be happy to try and impart as much knowledge as possible in a short time frame.
